data.text: @cnnphilippines Have suggested it to my former office mates!
Garcia: You have to stay connected with family and friends.
Garcia: Don’t be scared to ask for help. Kasi tayong mga Pilipino ang nagiging problema natin is sinasarili natin ang problema natin. Mas mahirap ‘yung walang sinsabihan ng problema.
Garcia on protecting mental health: We should eat, sleep and exercise, balanse lahat. Hindi ‘yung over-eating, oversleeping or hindi natutulog na insomniac ka.
Leachon says the private sector should be involved in the exit plan.

What should a transition pandemic exit plan look like?

Leachon stresses the need to complete the vaccination program, continue wearing masks and implementing ventilation, and to procure oral antiviral drugs.
@cnnphilippines @iampinkywebb @FreddieMD Panahon daw nang covid.. hundred thousands ang binaril nang pulis dahil lumabas sa bahay.. Tanong mo dito. https://t.co/tFewg2iG8q
Leachon: Bago in-open ang clinic, ang aming hospital pinareview sa architects and mga engineers ang kanyang ventilation.

Agar: Kung hindi kayang ventilation, i-treat ‘yung nagcicirculate ng air within. Kailangan mag-install ng air purifiers. 

Leachon also suggests opening windows in an air-conditioned room.
Agar: Ang problem is to implement the ventilation in the first place. Some establishments, medyo luxury ‘yun.
